definitions.definition: A burn on the skin caused by excess exposure to the sun 's rays .
A burn on the tissue of crop plants or their fruits (especially if they are rich in water like tomatoes , grapes , apples , gooseberries ) caused by excess exposure to the sun 's rays .

main_definition: A burn on the skin caused by excess exposure to the sun 's rays .
secondary_definitions: A burn on the tissue of crop plants or their fruits (especially if they are rich in water like tomatoes , grapes , apples , gooseberries ) caused by excess exposure to the sun 's rays .
